original_title: This Isn't... How I Met Your Mother... It's a XXX Spoof!

It was a rip-roaring Gang Bang with a roomful of the biggest cocks I'd ever seen, and your mom was taking every one of them, and taking them in every hole, three at a time! title: This Isn't... How I Met Your Mother... It's a XXX Spoof!
